Those who protect themselves and those w: Those who do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind don’t protect themselves
Even if they’re protected by a company of elephants, cavalry, chariots, or infantry, they still don’t protect themselves
Because such protection is exterior, not interior
That’s why they don’t protect themselves
Those who do good things by way of body, speech, and mind do protect themselves
Even if they’re not protected by a company of elephants, cavalry, chariots, or infantry, they still protect themselves
Because such protection is interior, not exterior
That’s why they do protect themselves
Restraint is good (a causal sequence) [s: Restraint of the body is good
